data.title: Yari Film Group
data.text:
BRETT SIMON makes his feature directorial debut with ASSASSINATION OF A HIGH SCHOOL PRESIDENT.

Simon�s music videos have captured intricate narratives and visceral performances while maintaining a strong commitment to visual experimentation. Simon has worked with such bands as Queens of the Stone Age, Sum 41, and The Killers.

Simon�s short films and videos have appeared in festivals around the world including Sundance, Toronto, Telluride and ResFest, where they have won several first prizes. Simon�s short �The Sailor�s Girl� was created under Fox Searchlab and screened at Sundance 2005. Simon�s short �Counterfeit Film� was made with a photocopy machine and won awards around the world. Before moving to Los Angeles, Simon taught film history and digital filmmaking at UC Berkeley. Simon graduated from Princeton University with a degree in Comparative Literature and Creative Writing.
